mapper.select: SELECT reserved_rooms.id, reserved_rooms.price, reserved_rooms.start_date, reserved_rooms.end_date, reserved_rooms.status, users.id AS uId, users.login, users.password, users.name, users.surname, users.middlename, users.email, rooms.id AS rId, rooms.number, rooms.number_of_rooms, rooms.class, rooms.price_per_day FROM reserved_rooms LEFT JOIN users ON reserved_rooms.user_id = users.id LEFT JOIN rooms ON reserved_rooms.room_id = rooms.id
